original_text: And John was clothed with camel's hair, and with a girdle of a skin about his loins; and he did eat locusts and wild honey;
korean_text: 요한은 낙타털 옷을 입고 허리에 가죽 띠를 띠고 메뚜기와 석청을 먹더라

sentences.original_text: And John was clothed with camel's hair
and with a girdle of a skin about his loins
and he did eat locusts and wild honey
